posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
The build looks solid.
If you play against other dev crit'ers, you want a higher fort save. Start with str 16 and dex 10 and replace a g.str feat with epic fortitude.
You can improve cha by replacing +str/g.str by +cha/g.cha and by starting with a higher cha and lower dex. You can end up with str 38 dex 8 cha 18 or str 36 dex 8 cha 20 that way. But once you do that, you also want to start looking at the divine feats.

A couple of minor suggestions for the skills: You want the modified UMD to end at either 35 or 40, now it is 38. You have some remaining skillpoints. Put them in spellcraft on the bard levels. A spellcraft 27 (30) Will boost the saves vs spells with +6.
